entry.title: Is Coinbase A Bitcoin Black Hole?

media:group.media:title: Is Coinbase A Bitcoin Black Hole?
media:group.media:description:
Join Bitcoin University Premium:
https://www.bitcoinuniversity.com

In this video, I discuss whether there are existential risks to Bitcoin caused by Coinbase being the largest custodian for Bitcoin spot ETF issuers.

I conclude that there are not, and that Bitcoin will continue to be moved around over time. BlackRock will probably switch to a big bank as custodian at some point for its ETF, and the big tech companies will also seek to get in on the action.

Also, because Bitcoin is proof of work, owning more coins does not give you more control over the protocol, unlike proof of stake.

Not investment advice! Consult a financial advisor.

List of Bitcoin ETF custodians:
